itunes:title: JUL 13, 2022 - THE BIDEN REGIME IS BRINGING COVID BACK IN TIME FOR THE MIDTERMS
title: JUL 13, 2022 - THE BIDEN REGIME IS BRINGING COVID BACK IN TIME FOR THE MIDTERMS
description:
DISTURBING VIDEO LEAKED: Full video of the Uvalde Elementary School Shooting and police response shows heavily-armed officers from multiple departments waiting in the hallways, with some checking their phones and getting hand sanitizer while the shooting is taking place. Next, the January 6th show committee debunked themselves after revealing text messages between Kremer and Mike Lindell, revealing the march at the Capitol wasn’t planned by Donald Trump. Meanwhile, no-vax Djokovic stands firm on the right to choose to be vaccinated as the Biden administration warns of the BA.5 Covid-19 subvariant. Finally, a Portland Antifa radio host is arrested for the international trafficking and rape of a Canadian child. 


Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec
